message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you! I'm asking for $115.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Can you meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While I can't quite go down to $105, I'm willing to come down a bit to $110. This is a very fair price for a product of this quality.
I'm still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. How about $107.50?
Bob, I appreciate you working with me on the price.  I'm willing to accept a small loss to make this sale.  My final offer is $109.  This is a great deal for you!
I'm getting close, but I think I can do better. How about $108?
